goals.question: What is the trend of CO2 concentration over time?
goals.visualization: line chart of CO2 concentration over time
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand if the CO2 concentration is increasing, decreasing or remaining constant over time.

goals.question: What is the distribution of CO2 concentration?
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand the range and frequency of CO2 concentration values in the dataset.

goals.question: What is the relationship between CO2 and adjusted CO2?
goals.visualization: scatter plot of CO2 vs adjusted CO2
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand if there is a correlation between CO2 and adjusted CO2 values in the dataset.

goals.question: What is the average CO2 concentration per year?
goals.visualization: bar chart of average CO2 concentration per year
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand the average CO2 concentration per year and if there are any trends or patterns over time.

goals.question: What is the distribution of CO2 concentration by month?
goals.visualization: box plot of CO2 concentration by month
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand if there are any seasonal patterns in the CO2 concentration values in the dataset.

code:
```
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import statsmodels.api as sm
import matplotlib.ticker as ticker

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['Date'] = pd.to_datetime(data['Date'], format='%Y-%m-%d', errors='ignore')
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
    ax = plt.gca()
    ax.xaxis.set_major_locator(ticker.MaxNLocator(20))
    ax.xaxis.set_tick_params(rotation=90)
    plt.plot(data['Date'], data['CO2'])
    plt.title('What is the trend of CO2 concentration over time?', wrap=True)
    return plt

chart = plot(data)
```

```
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotlib.ticker as ticker

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['Date'] = pd.to_datetime(data['Date'], format='%Y-%m-%d', errors='ignore')
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
    plt.hist(data['CO2'], bins=20, color='blue', alpha=0.5)
    plt.xlabel('CO2 Concentration')
    plt.ylabel('Frequency')
    plt.title('What is the distribution of CO2 concentration?', wrap=True)
    plt.xticks(rotation=45)
    plt.gca().xaxis.set_major_locator(ticker.MaxNLocator(20))
    return plt

chart = plot(data)
```

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import statsmodels.api as sm
import matplotlib.ticker as ticker

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['Date'] = pd.to_datetime(data['Date'], format='%Y-%m-%d', errors='ignore')
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
    plt.scatter(data['CO2'], data['adjusted_CO2'])
    plt.xlabel('CO2')
    plt.ylabel('adjusted_CO2')
    plt.title('What is the relationship between CO2 and adjusted CO2?', wrap=True)
    plt.xticks(rotation=45)
    plt.gca().xaxis.set_major_locator(ticker.MaxNLocator(20))
    return plt

chart = plot(data)

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotlib.ticker as ticker

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['Date'] = pd.to_datetime(data['Date'], format='%Y-%m-%d', errors='ignore')
    data['Year'] = data['Date'].dt.year
    avg_co2 = data.groupby('Year')['CO2'].mean()
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
    ax = avg_co2.plot(kind='bar')
    ax.set_title('What is the average CO2 concentration per year?', wrap=True)
    ax.set_xlabel('Year')
    ax.set_ylabel('Average CO2 Concentration')
    ax.xaxis.set_major_locator(ticker.MaxNLocator(20))
    plt.xticks(rotation=90)
    return plt

chart = plot(data)

```
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import statsmodels.api as sm
import matplotlib.ticker as ticker

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['Date'] = pd.to_datetime(data['Date'], format='%Y-%m-%d', errors='ignore')
    data['Month'] = data['Date'].dt.month
    fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(6, 6))
    ax.boxplot(data.groupby('Month')['CO2'].apply(list), showfliers=False)
    ax.set_title('What is the distribution of CO2 concentration by month?', wrap=True)
    ax.set_xlabel('Month')
    ax.set_ylabel('CO2 Concentration')
    ax.xaxis.set_major_locator(ticker.MaxNLocator(20))
    plt.xticks(rotation=45)
    return plt

chart = plot(data)
```
